授業方法: Due to the continued risk of Covid-19 throughout Kansai, this study program will be held ONLINE. On-demand topic-based tasks, grammar, vocabulary focus, writing practice and self-study tasks (listening/viewing) will be assigned weekly. Regular Zoom sessions will be held for discussion, feedback, idea sharing and exchange.
